column1:
share on x tammy rankin. jun 21 at 9:04 am so sorry for your loss girls... she was a very supportive mother. she was always at our volleyball games rooting for us. she was a good person for sure!! comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x rl ronda lane. jun 21 at 8:04 am lit a candle in memory of marcia lynette lane. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x stephanie burris. jun 21 at 6:57 am lit a candle in memory of marcia lynette lane. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x al amanda larrisonjun 21 at 4:50 am lit a candle in memory of marcia lynette lane. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x stephanie burris. jun 21 at 3:38 am i love you more, mama! thanks for being the best mom and grandma ever. i miss you so much already. heaven gained an angel. until i see you again, know that you are my heart and i was so blessed to have you as my mom. 1 comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... currently no events are scheduled. wall 365 days of grief support. subscribe bundy-law funeral home website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store
